analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x4f17d93bff1a057d0eaf6ec862eba9baba2d6d7f.sol#538-542) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4f17d93bff1a057d0eaf6ec862eba9baba2d6d7f.sol#542)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/38/0x4f17d93bff1a057d0eaf6ec862eba9baba2d6d7f.sol#643-654) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/38/0x4f17d93bff1a057d0eaf6ec862eba9baba2d6d7f.sol#645-647)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/38/0x4f17d93bff1a057d0eaf6ec862eba9baba2d6d7f.sol#663-670) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/38/0x4f17d93bff1a057d0eaf6ec862eba9baba2d6d7f.sol#668-670)
